## Pull Request Summary

**Type of contribution:**  
- [ ] Add new paper  
- [ ] Add new dataset or tool  
- [ ] Fix or update existing entry  
- [ ] Documentation / README / schema update  
- [ ] Other (please describe):

### Description
<!-- Briefly describe what this PR adds or changes -->
_Example: Added 2025 paper “TactileNet: Bridging the Accessibility Gap…” to `data/papers.csv`.


## Checklist

Please confirm the following before submitting:

- [ ] Added or updated entry in `data/papers.csv`  
- [ ] Followed the **tag vocabulary** from `CONTRIBUTING.md` (`gan`, `diffusion`, `mllm`, etc.)  
- [ ] Verified links (PDF, DOI, arXiv) are **stable and functional**  
- [ ] Included a **short, factual note** (≤2 lines)  
- [ ] Used **consistent formatting** and year ordering. 
- [ ] No duplicate entries in the CSV.
